verbose_text: Using Magiorakos et al. definitions for multidrug resistant and panresistant P. aeruginosa [XREF_BIBR], all MBL positive isolates were multidrug resistant with a high level of resistant to imipenem (MIC 16 to> = 32 mug/ml), meropenem (MIC 16 to> = 32 mug/ml), and ceftazidime (MIC 64 to> = 512 mug/ml).
evidence: level of resistant to imipenem (MIC 16 to >= 32 mug/ml), meropenem (MIC 16 to >= 32 mug/ml), and ceftazidime
